::Halucigen::
Silently the small scorpion resurfaced behind Cyanide.  Creeping behind 
he swung his tail trying to prick the bot and inject his control vessel 
into the bot to give Halucigen limited control over the bot.

Legendarynemasis@... wrote:

> Cyanide looks to Cygnar.
> 
> Cyanide: "No, the bots and everything in this base are ours. You seem to 
> have
> your fair share of men. Dont make us "lay off" a few of your employees."
